name: Qurzor
description:
Qurzor is a simple fun game.  You protect your coins from enemies, but if you touch your coins you lose the game. 

Controls:

The pizza is the cursor.

Press the right-click and the character will follow your mouse.

Your task:

Given a random time. You have to survive.

You can escape with 'Alt + F4'

I hope you will like it! :)
